    recommender system

    추천시스템에 대해서 알아보자! 앤드류응의 머신러닝 강의 중 추천시스템 부분에 대해서 정리하였습니다.

    problem formulation

    Movie Alice(1) Bob(2) Carol(3) Dave(4)
    Love at last 5 5 0 0
    Romance forever 5 ? ? 0
    Cute puppies of love ? 4 0 ?
    Nonstop car chases 0 0 5 4
    Swords vs. karete 0 0 5 ?

    = number of users
    = number of movies
    = 1 if user has rated movie
    = rating given by user to movie (defined only if )

    given and , we try to predict what these values of the question mark should be

    Content Based Recommendations

    Movie Alice(1) Bob(2) Carol(3) Dave(4)
    Love at last 5 5 0 0 0.9 0
    Romance forever 5 ? ? 0 1.0 0.01
    Cute puppies of love ? 4 0 ? 0.99 0
    Nonstop car chases 0 0 5 4 0.1 1.0
    Swords vs. karete 0 0 5 ? 0 0.9

    For each user j, learn a prarameter ( n is the number of features. In above example, n = 2 because of ). Predict user as rating movie with stars. ( = feature vector of movie )

    example of Alice’s rating of “Cute pupples of love” (Assumed learned by model)

    = feature vector for movie
